unnormalised: Ever wonder if your Insta fam is genuine, or just bots from Bengaluru? New follower analytics tools are popping up faster than vada pav stalls at Dadar Chowpatty! These platforms promise to dissect your audience, revealing everything from age and location (think: are you big in Bihar?) to their engagement levels.
normalised: Ever wonder if your Insta fam is genuine, or just bots from Bengaluru? New follower analytics tools are popping up faster than vada pav stalls at Dadar Chowpatty! These platforms promise to dissect your audience, revealing everything from age and location (think: are you big in Bihar?) to their engagement levels.

unnormalised: Some desi influencers are already swearing by them, claiming they’ve boosted their brand deals by identifying fake followers. Apparently, brands are tired of paying for ghost audiences - who knew! Expect more scrutiny of follower counts, especially after that "Sharma ji ka beta" scandal of '22.
normalised: Some desi influencers are already swearing by them, claiming they’ve boosted their brand deals by identifying fake followers. Apparently, brands are tired of paying for ghost audiences - who knew! Expect more scrutiny of follower counts, especially after that "Sharma ji ka beta" scandal of two thousand and twenty two.

unnormalised: Tools now offer insights into peak engagement times (07:00 AM seems to be the sweet spot for Mumbai) and even suggest optimal posting frequencies. Plus, they can analyze competitor profiles – spy on Neha’s engagement strategies, maybe? Just remember, a high follower count isn't everything; genuine connection, like that perfect cup of chai at 4:00 PM, is what really matters! Report from IIM Ahmedabad suggests these tools are being implemented from 26/01/2024.
